title: LAKEVIEW 4 BED 2 BATH W/D IN UNIT GRANITE S/S A/C HWF A/C W/D IN UNIT
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 187284095', 'Rent: $3,400 / Month', 'Beds: 4', 'Bath: 2', 'Available Date: 07/01/2022', 'Pet: Pet Friendly', 'This four bedroom, two bathroom apartment in Lakeview features an updated kitchen with granite counter tops, stainless steel appliances, and a dishwasher.', 'Hardwood floors throughout, exposed brick walls and duct work, a fireplace, and in-unit laundry.', 'This building is pet friendly.', 'Call today to schedule a private showing!', 'FEATURES', 'Cats OK', 'Central A/C', 'Dishwasher', 'Dogs OK', 'Exposed Brick', 'Fireplace', 'Granite Counter Tops', 'Hardwood Floors', 'Laundry In Unit', 'Pet Friendly', 'Stainless Steel Appliances']
